body: This sounds like an issue with Rhino installation. Can you try to just import Grasshopper in a GHPython component? Type line below in the component and press ok. import Grasshopper.Kernel as gh Does it give you an error? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/RBh5pTSdbmuqD3hCoxcE2Hz8WznNXZ2-uh6Wg9LgtS7irfat8lr7PyEv5mssodn8NpkjIUkF4gsvDeN16wykafGHil4g6BpJ/importGH.PNG)
